channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2024110622
item.description:
Report X-2024110622

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-19T12:23:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-13
  • City: LOGAN
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package was found lying on its side on the trailer during the unload process with paint leaking out of package. Package was immediately taken to QA for inspection. It was discovered that the paint can was lying on its side inside the package with no clips and an open lid. The outer packaging has no hazmat labels of any kind on the outside. Spill was wiped up in the trailer and absorbent sand was put on remaining paint. Packages that were leaked onto were repacked.
